name: Letter Drop Word Puzzle Game
description:
Features:
► One Tap Controls
► Challenging Gameplay
► Simple Polished Graphics with 20+ Themes
► Satisfying action
► Made for All Ages

How to Play:
Tap on letters as they fall onto the screen. Create words and submit them.

How many words can you create before the screen fills up with letters?

Be quick: you cannot use a word more than once in one game!

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
